name: D3 Keperawatan
advantages: "[{\"title\":\"Praktik Klinik Intensif\",\"desc\":\"Fokus pada keterampilan teknis keperawatan.\"}]"
advantagesEn: "[{\"title\":\"Intensive Clinical Practice\",\"desc\":\"Focus on technical nursing skills.\"}]"
description: Program Studi D3 Keperawatan UNAIC menghasilkan perawat pelaksana yang terampil dan berakhlakul karimah.
descriptionEn: The D3 Nursing Program at UNAIC produces skilled vocational nurses with noble character.

name: Profesi Bidan
advantages: "[{\"title\":\"Lulusan Kompeten\",\"desc\":\"Lulusan siap kerja dengan sertifikasi kompetensi nasional.\"}]"
advantagesEn: "[{\"title\":\"Competent Graduates\",\"desc\":\"Work-ready graduates with national competence certification.\"}]"
description: Program Pendidikan Profesi Bidan UNAIC merupakan kelanjutan dari S1 Kebidanan untuk mendapatkan gelar Bidan (Bds.).
descriptionEn: The Midwife Profession Education Program at UNAIC is a continuation of S1 Midwifery to obtain the Midwife title (Bds.).

name: Profesi Ners
advantages: "[{\"title\":\"Kerjasama RS Luas\",\"desc\":\"Praktik di berbagai RS tipe A dan B di Indonesia.\"}]"
advantagesEn: "[{\"title\":\"Wide Hospital Network\",\"desc\":\"Practice in various Type A and B hospitals in Indonesia.\"}]"
description: Program Pendidikan Profesi Ners UNAIC mencetak Ners yang memiliki kemampuan klinis dan manajerial yang unggul.
descriptionEn: The Nurse Profession Education Program at UNAIC produces Nurses with excellent clinical and managerial abilities.

name: S1 Kebidanan
advantages: "[{\"title\":\"Kebidanan Komplementer\",\"desc\":\"Fokus pada pelayanan kebidanan alami dan holistik.\"}]"
advantagesEn: "[{\"title\":\"Complementary Midwifery\",\"desc\":\"Focus on natural and holistic midwifery services.\"}]"
description: Program Studi S1 Kebidanan UNAIC mencetak bidan profesional yang unggul dalam pelayanan kebidanan komplementer dan berbasis nilai Islami.
descriptionEn: The S1 Midwifery Program at UNAIC produces professional midwives who excel in complementary midwifery services based on Islamic values.

name: S1 Ilmu Keperawatan
advantages: "[{\"title\":\"Standard Internasional\",\"desc\":\"Mengacu pada kurikulum nasional dengan wawasan global.\"},{\"title\":\"Research Based\",\"desc\":\"Pembelajaran berbasis riset untuk mengembangkan inovasi keperawatan.\"},{\"title\":\"Leadership Character\",\"desc\":\"Membentuk karakter kepemimpinan yang kuat dan berintegritas.\"}]"
advantagesEn: "[{\"title\":\"International Standard\",\"desc\":\"Refers to the national curriculum with a global perspective.\"},{\"title\":\"Research Based\",\"desc\":\"Research-based learning to develop nursing innovation.\"},{\"title\":\"Leadership Character\",\"desc\":\"Forms strong and high-integrity leadership character.\"}]"
careerProspects: "[\"Professional Nurse di RS Nasional/Internasional\",\"Nurse Manager / Kepala Ruang\",\"Clinical Instructor\",\"Peneliti Keperawatan\",\"Occupational Health Nurse\"]"
careerProspectsEn: "[\"Professional Nurse in National/International Hospitals\",\"Nurse Manager / Unit Head\",\"Clinical Instructor\",\"Nursing Researcher\",\"Occupational Health Nurse\"]"
description: Program Studi S1 Ilmu Keperawatan UNAIC bertujuan menghasilkan lulusan yang memiliki kompetensi dalam pelayanan keperawatan profesional di rumah sakit, komunitas, dan berbagai fasilitas kesehatan. Kurikulum memadukan teori, praktik klinik, penelitian, serta nilai Islami yang memperkuat etika profesi perawat.
descriptionEn: The S1 Nursing Program at UNAIC aims to produce graduates with competencies in professional nursing services in hospitals, communities, and various health facilities. The curriculum combines theory, clinical practice, research, and Islamic values that strengthen nursing professional ethics.

name: S1 Fisioterapi
description: Program Studi S1 Fisioterapi UNAIC menghasilkan fisioterapis yang handal dalam pemulihan gerak dan fungsi tubuh.
descriptionEn: The S1 Physiotherapy Program at UNAIC produces physiotherapists reliable in restoring movement and body function.

name: D3 Farmasi
advantages: [{"title":"Keterampilan Teknis","desc":"Fokus pada pelayanan resep dan manajemen obat."}]
advantagesEn: [{"title":"Technical Skills","desc":"Focus on prescription service and drug management."}]
description: Program Studi D3 Farmasi UNAIC mencetak tenaga teknis kefarmasian yang handal dan profesional.
descriptionEn: The D3 Pharmacy Program at UNAIC produces reliable and professional pharmaceutical technical personnel.

name: D4 Teknologi Laboratorium Medis
advantages: [{"title":"Lab Modern","desc":"Fasilitas laboratorium dengan peralatan medis terkini."}]
advantagesEn: [{"title":"Modern Labs","desc":"Laboratory facilities with the latest medical equipment."}]
description: Program Studi D4 Teknologi Laboratorium Medis (TLM) menghasilkan ahli lab medik yang kompeten dalam diagnostik laboratorium.
descriptionEn: The D4 Medical Laboratory Technology (TLM) Program produces medical lab specialists competent in laboratory diagnostics.

name: Profesi Apoteker
advantages: [{"title":"Program Singkat","desc":"Pendidikan profesi satu tahun setelah S1 Farmasi."}]
advantagesEn: [{"title":"Short Program","desc":"One-year professional education after S1 Pharmacy."}]
description: Program Pendidikan Profesi Apoteker UNAIC mencetak Apoteker yang berintegritas dan unggul dalam pelayanan kefarmasian.
descriptionEn: The Apothecary Profession Education Program at UNAIC produces Pharmacists with integrity and excellence in pharmaceutical services.

name: S1 Informatika
advantages: [{"title":"Software Engineering","desc":"Pengembangan perangkat lunak handal untuk berbagai platform."},{"title":"Artificial Intelligence","desc":"Penerapan kecerdasan buatan untuk analisis data dan otomatisasi."},{"title":"Cyber Security","desc":"Keamanan informasi dan jaringan komputer yang terjamin."}]
advantagesEn: [{"title":"Software Engineering","desc":"Reliable software development for various platforms."},{"title":"Artificial Intelligence","desc":"Application of artificial intelligence for data analysis and automation."},{"title":"Cyber Security","desc":"Guaranteed information and computer network security."}]
careerProspects: ["Software Developer / Engineer","Data Scientist / Analyst","UI/UX Designer","Network & Security Specialist","Technopreneur / Startup Founder"]
careerProspectsEn: ["Software Developer / Engineer","Data Scientist / Analyst","UI/UX Designer","Network & Security Specialist","Technopreneur / Startup Founder"]
description: Program Studi S1 Informatika UNAIC mempersiapkan mahasiswa untuk menguasai pengembangan perangkat lunak, kecerdasan buatan, keamanan siber, dan teknologi digital terbaru. Lulusan diharapkan mampu berkontribusi di industri IT, wirausaha digital, maupun penelitian, dengan menjunjung tinggi nilai-nilai Islami dalam praktik profesinya.
descriptionEn: The S1 Informatics Program at UNAIC prepares students to master software development, artificial intelligence, cyber security, and the latest digital technologies. Graduates are expected to contribute to the IT industry, digital entrepreneurship, and research, while upholding Islamic values in their professional practice.

name: S1 Farmasi
advantages: [{"title":"Farmasi Klinis Komunitas","desc":"Unggul dalam pelayanan kefarmasian di RS dan komunitas."},{"title":"Teknologi Kosmetika","desc":"Pengembangan produk kosmetik halal dan aman."},{"title":"Herbal Medicine","desc":"Riset dan pengembangan obat tradisional berbasis ilmiah."}]
advantagesEn: [{"title":"Clinical & Community Pharmacy","desc":"Excellent in pharmaceutical services in hospitals and communities."},{"title":"Cosmetic Technology","desc":"Development of halal and safe cosmetic products."},{"title":"Herbal Medicine","desc":"Scientific-based research and development of traditional medicines."}]
careerProspects: ["Apoteker di Rumah Sakit / Apotek","Industri Farmasi & Kosmetik","Balai POM / Dinas Kesehatan","Peneliti Obat & Herbal","Entrepreneur Farmasi"]
careerProspectsEn: ["Pharmacist in Hospital / Pharmacy","Pharmaceutical & Cosmetic Industry","Agency for Food and Drug Control / Health Office","Drug & Herbal Researcher","Pharmaceutical Entrepreneur"]
description: Program Studi S1 Farmasi UNAIC mempersiapkan lulusan dengan pengetahuan dan keterampilan dalam bidang kefarmasian, termasuk farmakologi, teknologi farmasi, manajemen obat, dan penelitian ilmiah. Dengan kurikulum berbasis nilai Islami, lulusan diharapkan mampu berperan di industri farmasi, rumah sakit, apotek, maupun riset pengembangan obat.
descriptionEn: The S1 Pharmacy Program at UNAIC prepares graduates with knowledge and skills in the pharmaceutical field, including pharmacology, pharmaceutical technology, drug management, and scientific research. With an Islamic values-based curriculum, graduates are expected to play a role in the pharmaceutical industry, hospitals, pharmacies, and drug development research.

name: S1 Bisnis Digital
advantages: [{"title":"E-Business Strategy","desc":"Perancangan model bisnis digital yang inovatif dan berkelanjutan."},{"title":"Digital Marketing","desc":"Penguasaan strategi pemasaran modern berbasis data dan teknologi."},{"title":"Fintech Innovation","desc":"Pemahaman teknologi keuangan dan sistem pembayaran digital."}]
advantagesEn: [{"title":"E-Business Strategy","desc":"Designing innovative and sustainable digital business models."},{"title":"Digital Marketing","desc":"Mastery of modern marketing strategies based on data and technology."},{"title":"Fintech Innovation","desc":"Understanding financial technology and digital payment systems."}]
careerProspects: ["Digital Business Analyst / Consultant","E-Commerce Manager","Digital Marketing Specialist","Startup Founder / CEO","Product Manager (Tech)"]
careerProspectsEn: ["Digital Business Analyst / Consultant","E-Commerce Manager","Digital Marketing Specialist","Startup Founder / CEO","Product Manager (Tech)"]
description: Program Studi S1 Bisnis Digital UNAIC membekali mahasiswa dengan kemampuan manajemen bisnis berbasis teknologi, e-commerce, digital marketing, dan inovasi produk. Lulusan diharapkan mampu menjadi wirausahawan, pengembang startup, maupun profesional bisnis digital dengan fondasi nilai Islami.
descriptionEn: The S1 Digital Business Program at UNAIC equips students with technology-based business management, e-commerce, digital marketing, and product innovation skills. Graduates are expected to become entrepreneurs, startup developers, or digital business professionals with a foundation of Islamic values.

name: S1 Kewirausahaan
advantages: [{"title":"Business Incubator","desc":"Pendampingan bisnis langsung hingga peluncuran produk."}]
advantagesEn: [{"title":"Business Incubator","desc":"Direct business mentoring until product launch."}]
description: Program Studi S1 Kewirausahaan UNAIC mencetak wirausahawan masa depan yang inovatif dan berkarakter Islami.
descriptionEn: The S1 Entrepreneurship Program at UNAIC produces future entrepreneurs who are innovative and have an Islamic character.
